message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us and is worth $1500000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1350000. This is a significant discount from its true value, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a favorable rate. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.
